text: José Aldunate Lyon (June 5, 1917 - September 28, 2019) was a Society of Jesus and Chilean teacher, worker, priest and human rights activist. He was awarded the National Prize for Human Rights in 2016.Padre José Aldunate recibe Premio Nacional de Derechos HumanosPadre José Aldunate recibe Premio Nacional de Derechos HumanosJosé Aldunate Premio Nacional de DDHH: La sotana contra la opresión ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chilean educators Category:Chilean centenarians Category:Chilean human rights activists Category:Jesuits Category:People from Santiago
title: José Aldunate
